source: Br, Haverkorn van Rijsewijk, Nanchen A, Nallet S, Kleijn Rj, and Sauer U. “Large-Scale 13C-Flux Analysis Reveals Distinct Transcriptional Control of Respiratory and Fermentative Metabolism in Escherichia Coli.” Molecular Systems Biology 7 (March 29, 2011). https://doi.org/10.1038/msb.2011.9.
